original_text: Mary therefore took a pound of expensive ointment made from pure nard, and anointed the feet of Jesus and wiped his feet with her hair. The house was filled with the fragrance of the perfume.
korean_text: 마리아는 지극히 비싼 향유 곧 순전한 나드 한 근을 가져다가 예수의 발에 붓고 자기 머리털로 그의 발을 닦으니 향유 냄새가 집에 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: Mary therefore took a pound of expensive ointment made from pure nard
sentences.korean_translation: 마리아가 그리하여 순전한 나드로 만든 값비싼 향유 한 근을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and anointed the feet of Jesus
and wiped his feet with her hair
The house was filled with the fragrance of the perfume
